name: NeuralSoft
description:
NeuralSoft is the main ERP factory in Argentina with its own headquarters in Buenos Aires, Rosario and C칩rdoba.
Since its founding in 1989 by Gustavo Viceconti, owner and CEO, NeuralSoft has been committed to continuous improvement, service culture and passion for quality, targeting the needs of companies and developing management systems designed with the objective of adjust to the requirements of its customers.
